Class PlayerManager

java.lang.Object
com.game.utils.PlayerManager
public class PlayerManager extends Object
Manages player profiles including creation, deletion, loading, saving, and maintaining statistics like games played and won.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    PlayerManager.Player
    Represents a player profile with personal information and game statistics.

    • getAllPlayers

      public static List<PlayerManager.Player> getAllPlayers()
      Returns a copy of the list of all players.
      Returns:
      list of players

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public static PlayerManager.Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Gets the currently active player.
      Returns:
      current player or null if none selected

    • setCurrentPlayer

      public static void setCurrentPlayer(PlayerManager.Player player)
      Sets the currently active player.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to set as current

    • createPlayer

      public static PlayerManager.Player createPlayer(String nom, String prenom, String avatar)
      Creates a new player profile and saves it.
      Parameters:
      nom - last name
      prenom - first name
      avatar - avatar identifier
      Returns:
      the newly created Player instance

    • deletePlayer

      public static boolean deletePlayer(PlayerManager.Player player)
      Deletes a player profile and saves changes.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to delete
      Returns:
      true if the player was found and removed, false otherwise

    • findPlayer

      public static PlayerManager.Player findPlayer(String nom, String prenom)
      Finds a player by name.
      Parameters:
      nom - last name
      prenom - first name
      Returns:
      the Player if found, else null

    • recordGamePlayed

      public static void recordGamePlayed()
      Records that the current player has played a game.

    • recordGameWon

      public static void recordGameWon()
      Records that the current player has won a game.

    • savePlayers

      public static void savePlayers()
      Public method to save players list to file.

    • hasCurrentPlayer

      public static boolean hasCurrentPlayer()
      Checks if there is a current player set.
      Returns:
      true if a current player is set, false otherwise

    • getCurrentPlayerName

      public static String getCurrentPlayerName()
      Returns the name of the current player or a default message if none.
      Returns:
      current player name or "Aucun profil"

    • getPlayerCount

      public static int getPlayerCount()
      Returns the total number of player profiles.
      Returns:
      number of players

    • reloadPlayers

      public static void reloadPlayers()
      Forces reloading of the player list from the file.
